title: FantasyRPG Music2
description: This is a package of 23 emotional orchestral music tracks suitable for RPG, Fantasy, Adventure, Kid, and Mobile games. Let's embark on an adventure into the realm of fantasy.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/F0Bl504CCP0


This is a package of 23 emotional orchestral music tracks suitable for RPG, Fantasy, Adventure, Kid, and Mobile games. Let's embark on an adventure into the realm of fantasy.


File.

  • Aurora's Aria
  • Blossoms in Bloom
  • Breeze in the Valley
  • Butterfly Ballet
  • Cherry Blossom Cha Cha
  • Clouds' Carousel
  • Dances with Dandelions
  • Gentle Giants' Waltz
  • Giggles under the Moon
  • Mischief in the Meadow
  • Morning Dew Dance
  • Playful Puddle Jumper
  • Raindrop Rhapsody
  • Ripple of Joy
  • Seashell Symphony
  • Shadows Whispering Secrets
  • Skyward Dreamer
  • Sunny Skies Soiree
  • Twinkling Twilight
  • Veil of the Night Sky
  • Whimsical Winds


※ Copyright Notice!

This asset package is safe from copyright claims and warnings on YouTube. You are free to use this product as you wish, including for commercial projects, without any issues.
